meanings.definition: An abnormal increase in the number of white blood cells in the blood.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed the patient with leucocytosis after analyzing the blood test results.
meanings.sent2: Leucocytosis can indicate an infection or inflammation in the body.
meanings.sent3: The leucocytosis in his blood made him feel like a superhero with an army of defenders.
meanings.sent4: Her leucocytosis was like a shield, protecting her from the invading germs.
meanings.sent5: The leucocytosis surged through his veins, ready to battle any illness.

meanings.definition: The condition of having an elevated white blood cell count.
meanings.sent1: The nurse monitored the patient's leucocytosis closely to track any changes.
meanings.sent2: Leucocytosis is often a response to an infection or other health issue.
meanings.sent3: His leucocytosis was so high that it seemed like his blood was throwing a party.
meanings.sent4: In her body, leucocytosis was like a bustling city with white blood cells as busy citizens.
meanings.sent5: The leucocytosis level was a clear sign that the body was fighting something off.
